publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1069 Jim Tolson: Pitreavie Athletics Centre—That the Parliament welcomes the opening of the new indoor Pitreavie Athletics Centre; recognises the first-class facilities that the centre offers across a range of athletic disciplines, including sprinting, the long jump, the high jump and pole vaulting; acknowledges the role of sportscotland in supporting this project, not least in the provision of £500,000 to it via a lottery award grant, and looks forward to the prospect of major athletics events being attracted to Dunfermline as well as to many young athletes utilising the centre to train for success at the 2014 Commonwealth Games in Glasgow. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S3M-1069 Pitreavie Athletics Centre (lodged on 20 December 2007) Mike Pringle*, John Park*
S3M-1069 Pitreavie Athletics Centre (lodged on 20 December 2007) Hugh O’Donnell*, Patricia Ferguson*
S3M-1069 Pitreavie Athletics Centre (lodged on 20 December 2007) Robin Harper*
S3M-1069 Pitreavie Athletics Centre (lodged on 20 December 2007) Jamie McGrigor*
